players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Vote him out."
You: "Bob, you didn't kill Charlie. Diana's claim is unverified. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I think we should vote Alice; she didn't mention a name and seems suspicious."

You: "Bob, you didn't kill Charlie, so you can't be mafia. Diana, if Bob was mafia they'd kill Charlie. So Bob must be detective. Alice, you are a villager, so Bob's claim of you being mafia is false."
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie and I found you mafia. Alice, you lie. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Vote him out."

You: "I think we should vote Alice; she didn't mention a name and seems suspicious."

Alice: "Bob, you didn't kill Charlie, so you can't be mafia. Diana, if Bob was mafia they'd kill Charlie. So Bob must be detective. Alice, you are a villager, so Bob's claim of you being mafia is false."
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie and I found you mafia. Alice, you lie. Vote Bob."
